name: Bob
dialog: Hey there, traveler!
I lost 5 coins near the river.
Can you help me find them?

name: Alice
dialog: I love sunny days!
Have you seen the rainbow waterfall?
It's beautiful this time of year.

name: Sam
dialog: Hey! Do you like puzzles?
I have a challenge for you!

quest.description: Solve Sam's riddle near the forest.

name: Lily
dialog: I'm looking for rare flowers.
Can you gather 3 blue lilies for me?

quest.description: Collect 3 blue lilies in the meadow.

name: Mark
dialog: The wind whispers secrets at night.
Do you want to hear one?

name: Sara
dialog: I lost my map!
Can you help me find the treasure location?

quest.description: Find Sara's lost map near the mountains.

name: Henry
dialog: I love fishing by the lake.
Catch 3 fish for me?

name: Nina
dialog: I make magical potions.
Bring me 2 herbs and 1 mushroom.

quest.description: Collect 2 herbs and 1 mushroom for Nina.

name: Tom
dialog: The cave nearby is dangerous.
Can you explore it carefully?

quest.description: Explore the nearby cave and report back.

name: Emma
dialog: I heard there are shiny crystals in the forest.
Can you collect 3 of them?

quest.description: Collect 3 shiny crystals in the forest.

name: Oliver
dialog: I lost my lucky coin!
Can you find it for me?

name: Mia
dialog: I love painting!
Can you bring me a canvas and paintbrush?

quest.description: Bring Mia a canvas and a paintbrush.

name: Jack
dialog: I have a tricky riddle for you.
Solve it and get a reward!

name: Zoe
dialog: The forest is full of secrets.
Can you find the hidden treehouse?

quest.description: Locate the hidden treehouse in the forest.

name: Liam
dialog: I love racing!
Beat my best time in the nearby track!

quest.description: Beat Liam's best time on the track.

name: Sophia
dialog: The bakery is missing sugar.
Can you bring some from the market?

name: Noah
dialog: I like collecting rocks.
Find me 3 unique stones!

name: Ava
dialog: I want to bake a cake!
Bring me milk, eggs, and flour.

quest.description: Bring Ava milk, eggs, and flour.

name: Ethan
dialog: The mountain trail is tricky.
Can you mark safe paths for me?

quest.description: Mark safe paths on the mountain trail.

name: Isabella
dialog: I love reading books!
Bring me 2 books from the library.

quest.description: Bring Isabella 2 books from the library.
